title: Handle Supplier Compliance Documentation
description: A new product requires a certificate of compliance from the supplier before it can be sold. An agent must obtain this document.

tasks.description: Identify the new product and its compliance requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a specific compliance certificate is needed.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier and request the required certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal request to the supplier.

tasks.description: Receive the certificate and upload it to the compliance management system, linking it to the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully receives and archives the compliance document.
